title: Small Dose
expectations: May impair coordination and alter perception

title: Moderate Dose
targetUsers: Experienced consumers seeking to sustain sleep
expectations: Unaccustomed consumers may experience negative effects
May impair coordination and alter perception

title: Large Dose
targetUsers: Customers who have poor GI absorption of cannabinoids
People with significant tolerance to THC
expectations: Likely to impair coordination and alter perception

title: Experienced User Dose
targetUsers: Patients with cancer, inflammatory disorders, or conditions that necessitate high doses
expectations: Highly likely to impair coordination and alter perception
Can cause negative side effects such as rapid heart rate and nausea
